pairs.value: 平局！

pairs.key: Probability of being seen directly proportional to stupidity of act.
pairs.value: 被看到的概率与行为的愚蠢程度成正比

pairs.key: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
pairs.value: 自信地朝着你梦想的方向前进。

pairs.key: Love is as necessary as food and shelter.
pairs.value: 爱就像食物和住所一样必不可少。

pairs.key: May all your trades be great!
pairs.value: 愿你的交易都能顺利进行！

pairs.key: Only difference between a rut and a grave is depth.
pairs.value: 一成不变的生活和死亡没有什么区别，只是深度不同而已。

pairs.key: Practice safe eating. Always use condiments.
pairs.value: 注意饮食安全。经常使用调味品。

pairs.key: Don't eat the paper. (Paper)
pairs.value: 不要吃纸. (纸)

pairs.key: You can open doors with your charm and patience.
pairs.value: 你可以用你的魅力和耐心打开一扇扇大门。

pairs.key: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
pairs.value: 很多人在第一次遇到困难或疲惫时就放弃了，没有坚持下去发现自己还有更多的潜力和可能。

pairs.key: There is no mistake so great as that of being always right.
pairs.value: 永远认为自己是对的是最大的错误。

pairs.key: Money will come to you when you are doing the right thing.
pairs.value: 当你做正确的事情时，钱财就会自然而然地来到你身边。

pairs.key: Very Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 非常稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: At times, it is better to know when to exit than when to enter.
pairs.value: 有时候，知道什么时候退出比知道什么时候进入更重要。

pairs.key: No matter what your past has been, you a have a spotless future.
pairs.value: 无论你的过去如何，你的未来都是一片光明的。

pairs.key: Stop wishing. Start doing.
pairs.value: 停止幻想，准备行动。

pairs.key: Your worst enemy has a crush on you!
pairs.value: 你最讨厌的人对你有迷恋或暗恋！

pairs.key: A closed mouth gathers no feet.
pairs.value: 闭口无足。。

pairs.key: Put your unhappiness aside. Life is beautiful, be happy.
pairs.value: 不要让你的不快影响你。生活是美好的，要快乐。

pairs.key: Someone will invite you to a Karaoke party.
pairs.value: 有人会邀请你去唱卡拉OK。

pairs.key: Person who give self-haircut after rice wine will be buzzed.
pairs.value: 喝了米酒后自己剪头发的人会感到头晕。

pairs.key: Uncommon Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 不寻常的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: The wise man is the one that makes you think that he is dumb.
pairs.value: 智者是那种让你以为他很愚蠢的人。

pairs.key: Big journeys begin with a single step.
pairs.value: 千里之行，始于足下。

pairs.key: Soon, a visitor shall delight you.
pairs.value: 不久，一位访客将使你高兴。

pairs.key: Before you can be reborn you must die.
pairs.value: 要想重生，必须先死。

pairs.key: Bad luck and misfortune will follow you.
pairs.value: 厄运和不幸将缠绕着你。

pairs.key: He who laughs last is laughing at you.
pairs.value: 笑到最后的人是在嘲笑你。

pairs.key: People who are late are often happier than those who have to wait for them.
pairs.value: 迟到的人通常比等他们的人更快乐。

pairs.key: A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not why ships are built.
pairs.value: 船在港口是安全的，但那不是造船的目的。

pairs.key: If at first you don't succeed, skydiving not for you.
pairs.value: 如果一开始就不成功，那么跳伞不适合你。

pairs.key: Patience is a virtue, unless its against a brick wall.
pairs.value: 耐心是一种美德，除非它是对着一堵墙。

pairs.key: Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
pairs.value: 有志者事竟成。

pairs.key: Circumstance does not make the man; it reveals him to himself.
pairs.value: 环境不造就人；它只能让人认清自己。

pairs.key: Do not let what you do not have prevent you from using what you do have.
pairs.value: 不要因为你没有什么而阻止你利用你拥有什么。

pairs.key: The greatest risk is not taking one.
pairs.value: 最大的风险就是不冒风险。

pairs.key: Your fortune is as sweet as a cookie.
pairs.value: 你的运气像饼干一样甜。

pairs.key: Don't pursue happiness... create it.
pairs.value: 不要追求幸福，要创造幸福。

pairs.key: You have the deepest interest in all that is artistic.
pairs.value: 你对所有艺术的事物都有最深刻的兴趣。

pairs.key: Tomorrow at breakfast, listen carefully: do what rice krispies tell you to.
pairs.value: 听从你的直觉或者心愿，不要受别人的影响。

pairs.key: You will conquer obstacles to achieve success.
pairs.value: 你将克服困难，获得成功。

pairs.key: One that would have the fruit must climb the tree.
pairs.value: 想要果实就得爬树。

pairs.key: Some men dream of fortunes, others dream of cookies.
pairs.value: 有些人梦想财富，有些人梦想饼干。

pairs.key: A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.
pairs.value: 结论只是你厌倦思考的地方。

pairs.key: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together as they do in you.
pairs.value: 很少有像你一样美貌和美德兼备的人。

pairs.key: You will soon witness a miracle
pairs.value: 你很快就会见证一个奇迹。

pairs.key: Stay true to those who would do the same for you.
pairs.value: 对那些对你真心的人保持真诚。

pairs.key: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
pairs.value: 一个狂热者是一个不能改变自己的想法，也不愿意换个话题的人。

pairs.key: Extremely Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 极其稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: Don't worry about money. The best things in life are free.
pairs.value: 不要为钱担心。生活中最好的东西都是免费的。

pairs.key: The usefulness of a cup is in its emptiness.
pairs.value: 杯子的用处在于它的空虚。

pairs.key: Old friends make best friends
pairs.value: 老朋友是最好的朋友。

pairs.key: You will be hungry again in one hour.
pairs.value: 你一个小时后又会饿了。

pairs.key: Ones always regrets what could have done. Remember for next time.
pairs.value: 人总是后悔没有做过的事情。记住下次吧。

pairs.key: You are a hero to someone!
pairs.value: 你是某人的英雄！

pairs.key: If you have kleptomania. Take something for it.
pairs.value: 如果你有盗窃癖。'拿'点东西治治吧。

pairs.key: If you look back, you'll soon be going that way.
pairs.value: 如果你回头看，你很快就会走那条路。

pairs.key: Some days you are pigeon, some days you are statue. Today, bring umbrella.
pairs.value: 有些日子你是鸽子，有些日子你是雕像。今天带把伞吧。

pairs.key: Fortune not found? Abort, Retry, Ignore.
pairs.value: 运气找不到？中止、重试、忽略。

pairs.key: Everyday is a new day, but tomorrow is never promised.
pairs.value: 每天都是新的一天，但明天永远不会保证。

pairs.key: Of all our human resources, the most precious is the desire to improve.
pairs.value: 在我们所有的人力资源中，最珍贵的是进步的愿望。

pairs.key: Love is free. Lust will cost you everything you have.
pairs.value: 爱是免费的。欲望会让你付出你所拥有的一切。

pairs.key: I have a dream....Time to go to bed.
pairs.value: 我有一个梦想……该睡觉了。

pairs.key: You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.
pairs.value: 你不需要力量来放下某些东西。你真正需要的是理解。

pairs.key: The gods have smiled upon you!
pairs.value: 诸神对你微笑了！

pairs.key: Ninety-nine percent of all lawyers give the rest a bad name.
pairs.value: 百分之九十九的律师都给剩下的那一部分律师抹黑了。

pairs.key: The secret to staying young is good health and lying about your age.
pairs.value: 保持年轻的秘诀是健康和说谎关于你的年龄。

pairs.key: To determine whether someone is beautiful is not by looking at their appearance, but their heart.
pairs.value: 判断一个人是否美丽不是看他们的外表，而是看他们的心灵。

pairs.key: The cooler you think you are the dumber you look
pairs.value: 你越觉得自己很酷，你看起来越傻。

pairs.key: Land is always on the mind of a flying bird.
pairs.value: 飞鸟总想着陆地。

pairs.key: The greatest danger could be your stupidity.
pairs.value: 最大的危险可能是你的愚蠢。

pairs.key: Everyone agrees you are the best.
pairs.value: 每个人都认为你是最棒的。

pairs.key: A golden egg of opportunity falls into your lap this month.
pairs.value: 这个月，一个机会的金蛋会落到你的怀里。

pairs.key: Do not mistake temptation for opportunity.
pairs.value: 不要把诱惑当成机会。

pairs.key: You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime.
pairs.value: 你一生中会去很多异国他乡的地方。

pairs.key: The older you get, the better you were.
pairs.value: 你越老，你就越好。

pairs.key: Hardly anyone knows how much is gained by ignoring the future.
pairs.value: 几乎没有人知道忽视未来能够得到多少。

pairs.key: Be direct,usually one can accomplish more that way.
pairs.value: 直截了当吧，通常这样可以做得更多。

pairs.key: The problem with resisting temptation is that it may never come again.
pairs.value: 抵制诱惑的问题在于它可能再也不会出现了。

pairs.key: Your road to glory will be rocky but fulfilling.
pairs.value: 你通往荣耀的道路将会崎岖但充实。

pairs.key: He who throws dirt is losing ground. (DIRT)
pairs.value: 抛泥者自失地(DIRT)

pairs.key: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
pairs.value: 紧张是你认为你应该是什么样的人。放松是你真正是什么样的人。

pairs.key: Stop eating now. Food poisoning no fun.
pairs.value: 现在就停止吃东西。食物中毒不好玩。

pairs.key: You will live long enough to open many fortune cookies.
pairs.value: 你会活得足够长，能够打开很多幸运饼干。

pairs.key: Everything will now come your way.
pairs.value: 现在一切都会向着你的方向发展。

pairs.key: The important thing is to never stop questioning.
pairs.value: 重要的是永远不要停止质疑。

pairs.key: You will make many changes before settling down happily.
pairs.value: 你会做出很多改变，才能幸福地安定下来。

pairs.key: When in doubt, let your instincts guide you.
pairs.value: 当你有疑惑时，让你的本能指引你。

pairs.key: Time may fly by, but memories do not.
pairs.value: 时间可能飞逝，但回忆不会。

pairs.key: Success lies in the hands of those who wants it.
pairs.value: 成功掌握在那些想要它的人手中。

pairs.key: There are big changes ahead of you.  They will be good ones!
pairs.value: 你前方有很大的变化。它们会是好的！

pairs.key: The days that make us happy make us wise.
pairs.value: 让我们快乐的日子也让我们聪明。

pairs.key: You love peace.
pairs.value: 你爱和平。

pairs.key: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
pairs.value: 早起的鸟儿有虫吃，但第二只老鼠才能得到奶酪。

pairs.key: The simplest answer is to act.
pairs.value: 最简单的答案就是行动。

pairs.key: Your smile brings happiness to everyone you meet.
pairs.value: 你的微笑给你遇到的每个人带来幸福。

pairs.key: Life is too short to waste time hating anyone.
pairs.value: 生命太短暂了，不要浪费时间去恨任何人。

pairs.key: Gold is in your future.
pairs.value: 金子在你的未来。

pairs.key: It takes less time to do a thing right than it does to explain why you did it wrong.
pairs.value: 做对一件事所花费的时间比解释为什么做错了要少。

pairs.key: If a turtle doesn't have a shell, is it naked or homeless?
pairs.value: 如果一只乌龟没有壳了，它是裸体的还是无家可归的？

pairs.key: Wise person needs either good manners or fast reflexes.
pairs.value: 聪明的人需要有礼貌或者快速的反应。

pairs.key: You will be called to fill a position of high honor and responsibility.
pairs.value: 你将被召唤去担任一个高尚和重要的职位

pairs.key: Change is inevitable, except for vending machines.
pairs.value: 变化是不可避免的，除了自动售货机。

pairs.key: A cheerful message is on its way to you.
pairs.value: 一个快乐的消息正在向你赶来。

pairs.key: We cannot change the direction of the wind, but we can adjust our sails.
pairs.value: 我们不能改变风的方向，但我们可以调整我们的帆。

pairs.key: Tell them what you really think. Otherwise, nothing will change.
pairs.value: 告诉他们你真正想说的话。否则，什么都不会改变。

pairs.key: Adjust finances, make budgets, to improve you standing.
pairs.value: 调整财务，制定预算，以改善你的状况。

pairs.key: A kiss is not a kiss without the heart.
pairs.value: 没有心意的吻不算吻。

pairs.key: An admirer is concealing their affection for you.
pairs.value: 一个仰慕者正在对你隐藏他们的感情。

pairs.key: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
pairs.value: 如果你失败了，你可能会失望，但如果你不尝试，你就注定失败。

pairs.key: Fear is interest paid on a debt you may not owe.
pairs.value: 恐惧是你可能不欠的债务所付出的利息。

pairs.key: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
pairs.value: 一杯龙舌兰酒，两杯龙舌兰酒，三杯龙舌兰酒，倒在地板上。

pairs.key: We don't know the future, but here's a cookie.
pairs.value: 我们不知道未来，但这里有一块饼干。

pairs.key: You create enthusiasm around you.
pairs.value: 你在你周围创造热情。

pairs.key: He who dies with most toys, still dies.
pairs.value: 拥有最多玩具的人死了，还是死了。

pairs.key: Instead of worrying and agonizing, move ahead constructively.
pairs.value: 与其担心和痛苦，不如积极地向前进。

pairs.key: No distance is too far, if two hearts are tied together.
pairs.value: 如果两颗心紧紧相连，没有距离太远。

pairs.key: Everyone seems normal until you get to know them.
pairs.value: 每个人看起来都很正常，直到你了解他们。

pairs.key: Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.
pairs.value: 勇气不是没有恐惧；而是克服恐惧。

pairs.key: Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: The world may be your oyster, but it doesn't mean you'll get its pearl.
pairs.value: 世界可能是你的牡蛎，但这并不意味着你会得到它的珍珠。

pairs.key: Person who eat fortune cookie get lousy dessert.
pairs.value: 吃幸运饼干的人得到糟糕的甜点。

pairs.key: The pleasure of what you enjoy is lost by wanting more.
pairs.value: 你享受的快乐会因为贪求更多而失去。

pairs.key: Difficulty at the beginning usually means ease at the end.
pairs.value: 开始时的困难通常意味着最后的轻松。

pairs.key: A stranger is a friend you have not spoken to yet.
pairs.value: 陌生人是你还没有说话的朋友。

pairs.key: Age is high price to pay for maturity.
pairs.value: 成熟是用年龄换来的高昂代价。

pairs.key: Person who rests on laurels gets thorn in backside.
pairs.value: 安于现状的人会被荆棘刺痛屁股。

pairs.key: You are broad minded and socially active.
pairs.value: 你思想开阔，社交活跃。.

pairs.key: Smart husband buys wife fine china. Then she not trust him to wash it.
pairs.value: 聪明的丈夫给妻子买精美的瓷器。然后她就不相信他能洗干净它。

pairs.key: Your many hidden talents will become obvious to those around you.
pairs.value: 你的许多隐藏的才能将会显露给你周围的人。

pairs.key: Inside every old person is young person wondering what the hell happened.
pairs.value: 每个老人的内心都有一个年轻人在想发生了什么。

pairs.key: The fortune you seek is in another cookie.
pairs.value: 你寻求的运气在另一块饼干里。

pairs.key: Legendary Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 传说级幸运饼干：

pairs.key: You are the controller of your destiny.
pairs.value: 你是你命运的掌控者。

pairs.key: Your golden opportunity is coming shortly.
pairs.value: 你的黄金机会即将到来。

pairs.key: For success today look first to yourself.
pairs.value: 今天要想成功，先看看自己。

pairs.key: It's about time I got out of that cookie.
pairs.value: 我早该从那块饼干里出来了。

pairs.key: You will soon have an out of money experience.
pairs.value: 你很快就会有一次没钱的经历。

pairs.key: Minor aches today are likely to pay off handsomely tomorrow.
pairs.value: 今天的小小疼痛可能明天就会得到丰厚的回报。

pairs.key: Atheism no fun. No holidays.
pairs.value: 无神论没意思。没有假期。

pairs.key: You are given the chance to take part in an exciting adventure.
pairs.value: 你有机会参与一场令人兴奋的冒险。

pairs.key: Procrastination is art of keeping up with yesterday.
pairs.value: 拖延是一种跟昨天保持一致的艺术。

pairs.key: Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.
pairs.value: 去做你害怕的事情，恐惧就会消失。

pairs.key: Your emotional nature is strong and sensitive
pairs.value: 你的情感本质是强烈和敏感的。

pairs.key: An alien of some sort will be appearing to you shortly.
pairs.value: 一个某种类型的外星人很快就会出现在你面前。

pairs.key: A foolish man listens to his heart. A wise man listens to cookies.
pairs.value: 愚蠢的人听从自己的心。聪明的人听从饼干。

pairs.key: When marriage outlawed, only outlaws have in-laws.
pairs.value: 当婚姻被禁止(outlawed)时，只有罪犯(outlaws)才有姻亲(in-laws)。

pairs.key: Do not be overly judgemental of your loved one's intentions or actions.
pairs.value: 不要过分地评判你所爱之人的意图或行为。

pairs.key: He who seeks will find.
pairs.value: 寻找的人会找到。

pairs.key: Okay to look at past and future. Just don't stare.
pairs.value: 看看过去和未来没关系。只要不要盯着看。

pairs.key: A merry heart does good like a medicine.
pairs.value: 快乐的心如同良药。

pairs.key: The real kindness comes from within you.
pairs.value: 真正的善良来自于你内心。

pairs.key: A fool and his money are soon partying.
pairs.value: 傻瓜和他的钱很快就会分道扬镳。

pairs.key: I am worth a fortune!
pairs.value: 我值一大笔钱！

pairs.key: Easiest way to find lost object is buy replacement.
pairs.value: 找到丢失的东西最简单的方法就是买一个替代品。

pairs.key: Politicians are like diapers: change often, and for same reason.
pairs.value: 政治家就像尿布：经常换，而且原因相同。

pairs.key: At this very moment you can change the rest of your life.
pairs.value: 在这一刻你可以改变你余生的命运。

pairs.key: A dream you have will come true
pairs.value: 你有一个梦想会成真。

pairs.key: Present your best ideas today to an eager and welcoming audience.
pairs.value: 今天向一个渴望并欢迎你的听众展示你最好的想法。

pairs.key: Common Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 常见的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: Flattery will go far tonight.
pairs.value: 今晚奉承会有很大的作用。

pairs.key: Help! I am being held prisoner in a fortune cookie factory.
pairs.value: 救命！我被困在了一个幸运饼干工厂里。

pairs.key: Be calm when confronting an emergency crisis.
pairs.value: 面对紧急危机时要保持冷静。

pairs.key: The best is yet to come.
pairs.value: 最好的还在后头。

pairs.key: You will think for yourself when you stop letting others think for you
pairs.value: 当你不再让别人替你思考时，你就会为自己思考。

pairs.key: Patience is your alley at the moment. Don't worry!
pairs.value: 现在耐心是你的好帮手。别担心！

pairs.key: The cake is a lie!
pairs.value: 蛋糕是个谎言！

pairs.key: It may be those who do most, dream most
pairs.value: 可能那些做得最多的人，也是梦想最多的人。

pairs.key: Your reality check is about to bounce.
pairs.value: 你的现实检验即将失败。

pairs.key: Nothing is so much to be feared as fear.
pairs.value: 没有什么比恐惧更可怕。

pairs.key: Now these three remain, faith, hope, and love. The greatest of these is love.
pairs.value: 现在这三样东西仍然存在，信仰、希望和爱。其中最伟大的就是爱。

pairs.key: Compassion is a way of being.
pairs.value: 同情是一种生活方式。

pairs.key: You are cleverly disguised as responsible adult.
pairs.value: 你是一个巧妙地伪装成负责任的成年人。

pairs.key: Do what is right, not what you should.
pairs.value: 做正确的事，而不是做你应该做的事。

pairs.key: What breaks in a moment may take years to mend.
pairs.value: 一时之间破碎的东西，可能需要花费多年才能修复。

pairs.key: Drive like hell, you will get there.
pairs.value: 开车像地狱一样，你就会到达那里。

pairs.key: What some call stubbornness, others call persistence.
pairs.value: 有些人称之为固执，有些人称之为坚持。

pairs.key: You will be sharing great news with all people you love
pairs.value: 你将会和你所爱的所有人分享好消息。

pairs.key: If you want the rainbow, then you have to tolerate the rain.
pairs.value: 如果你想要彩虹，那么你就必须忍受雨水。

pairs.key: Hard work pays off in the future. Laziness pays off now.
pairs.value: 努力工作会在未来有回报。懒惰现在就有回报。

pairs.key: Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.
pairs.value: 正直就是做正确的事，即使没有人在看

pairs.key: If you have something good in your life, don't let it go!
pairs.value: 如果你生活中有好的东西，不要放手！

pairs.key: Today you shed your last tear. Tomorrow fortune knocks at your door.
pairs.value: 今天你流下了最后一滴眼泪。明天幸运会敲响你的门。

pairs.key: You will die alone and poorly dressed.
pairs.value: 你会孤独地死去，而且穿着很糟糕

pairs.key: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.
pairs.value: 笑声是两个人之间最短的距离

pairs.key: Good health will be yours for a long time.
pairs.value: 你会拥有长久的健康

pairs.key: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
pairs.value: 勇气不仅仅是一种美德，而是在考验时所有美德的形式

pairs.key: There is no spoon!
pairs.value: 没有勺子!

pairs.key: You are worth loving, you are also worth the effort it takes to love you
pairs.value: 你值得被爱，你也值得付出努力去爱你

pairs.key: Never upset the driver of the car you're in. They're the master of your destiny until you get home.
pairs.value: 永远不要惹恼你所乘坐车辆的司机。他们在你回家之前都是你命运的主宰。

pairs.key: Fat person not afraid of heights... afraid of widths.
pairs.value: 胖子不怕高，只怕宽

pairs.key: Live like you are on the bottom, even if you are on the top.
pairs.value: 即使你在顶端，也要像在底层一样生活

pairs.key: Before trying to please others think of what makes you happy.
pairs.value: 在试图取悦别人之前，想想什么让你快乐

pairs.key: All things are difficult before they are easy.
pairs.value: 凡事都是先难后易

pairs.key: Experience is what you have left when everything else is gone.
pairs.value: 当其他一切都失去了，你还剩下的就是经验

pairs.key: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
pairs.value: 要避免批评，就什么都不做，什么都不说，什么都不成为

pairs.key: It is better to have a hen tomorrow than an egg today.
pairs.value: 明天有只母鸡比今天有个鸡蛋好

pairs.key: He who throws mud loses ground.
pairs.value: 抛泥者必失地

pairs.key: When chosen for jury duty, tell judge... fortune cookie say guilty!
pairs.value: 当被选为陪审团时，告诉法官……幸运饼干说有罪！

pairs.key: You will take a pleasant journey to a place far away.
pairs.value: 你将会去一个遥远的地方进行一次愉快的旅行

pairs.key: There is a prospect of a thrilling time ahead for you.
pairs.value: 你的前方有一段令人激动的时光

pairs.key: You think it's a secret, but they know.
pairs.value: 你以为这是个秘密，但他们知道

pairs.key: He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
pairs.value: 能够自嘲的人永远不缺笑料

pairs.key: Ask yourself if what you are doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.
pairs.value: 问问自己，你今天所做的事情是否让你更接近明天想要到达的地方

pairs.key: If you want the rainbow, you have to tolerate the rain.
pairs.value: 如果你想要彩虹，就必须忍受雨水

pairs.key: Sing and rejoice, fortune is smiling on you.
pairs.value: 唱歌并欢呼吧，幸运正在向你微笑

pairs.key: Life does not get better by chance. It gets better by change.
pairs.value: 生活不会因为偶然而变好。它会因为改变而变好

pairs.key: A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study.
pairs.value: 与智者一席之谈胜过十年苦读

pairs.key: Probability of being seen directly proportional to stupidity of act.
pairs.value: 被看见的概率与行为的愚蠢程度成正比

pairs.key: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
pairs.value: 自信地朝着你梦想的方向前进

pairs.key: Love is as necessary as food and shelter.
pairs.value: 爱就像食物和住所一样必不可少

pairs.key: May all your trades be great!
pairs.value: 愿你的交易都能顺利进行！

pairs.key: Only difference between a rut and a grave is depth.
pairs.value: 一成不变的生活和死亡没有什么区别，只是深度不同而已。

pairs.key: Practice safe eating. Always use condiments.
pairs.value: 注意'饮食'安全。经常使用调味品/避孕套(condiments)。

pairs.key: Don't eat the paper. (Paper)
pairs.value: 不要吃纸. (纸)

pairs.key: You can open doors with your charm and patience.
pairs.value: 你可以用你的魅力和耐心打开一扇扇大门。

pairs.key: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
pairs.value: 很多人在第一次遇到困难或疲惫时就放弃了，没有坚持下去发现自己还有更多的潜力和可能。

pairs.key: There is no mistake so great as that of being always right.
pairs.value: 永远认为自己是对的是最大的错误。

pairs.key: Money will come to you when you are doing the right thing.
pairs.value: 当你做正确的事情时，钱财就会自然而然地来到你身边。

pairs.key: Very Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 非常稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: At times, it is better to know when to exit than when to enter.
pairs.value: 有时候，知道什么时候退出比知道什么时候进入更重要

pairs.key: No matter what your past has been, you a have a spotless future.
pairs.value: 无论你的过去如何，你的未来都是一片光明的

pairs.key: Stop wishing. Start doing.
pairs.value: 停止幻想，准备行动。

pairs.key: Your worst enemy has a crush on you!
pairs.value: 你最讨厌的人对你有迷恋或暗恋！

pairs.key: A closed mouth gathers no feet.
pairs.value: 闭口无足。。

pairs.key: Put your unhappiness aside. Life is beautiful, be happy.
pairs.value: 不要让你的不快影响你。生活是美好的，要快乐。

pairs.key: Someone will invite you to a Karaoke party.
pairs.value: 有人会邀请你去唱卡拉OK。

pairs.key: Person who give self-haircut after rice wine will be buzzed.
pairs.value: 喝了米酒后自己剪头发的人会感到头晕。

pairs.key: Uncommon Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 不寻常的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: The wise man is the one that makes you think that he is dumb.
pairs.value: 智者是那种让你以为他很愚蠢的人。

pairs.key: Big journeys begin with a single step.
pairs.value: 千里之行，始于足下。

pairs.key: Soon, a visitor shall delight you.
pairs.value: 不久，一位访客将使你高兴。

pairs.key: Before you can be reborn you must die.
pairs.value: 要想重生，必须先死。

pairs.key: Bad luck and misfortune will follow you.
pairs.value: 厄运和不幸将缠绕着你。

pairs.key: He who laughs last is laughing at you.
pairs.value: 笑到最后的人是在嘲笑你。

pairs.key: People who are late are often happier than those who have to wait for them.
pairs.value: 迟到的人通常比等他们的人更快乐。

pairs.key: A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not why ships are built.
pairs.value: 船在港口是安全的，但那不是造船的目的。

pairs.key: If at first you don't succeed, skydiving not for you.
pairs.value: 如果一开始就不成功，那么跳伞不适合你。

pairs.key: Patience is a virtue, unless its against a brick wall.
pairs.value: 耐心是一种美德，除非它是对着一堵墙。

pairs.key: Nothing is impossible to a willing heart.
pairs.value: 有志者事竟成。

pairs.key: Circumstance does not make the man; it reveals him to himself.
pairs.value: 环境不造就人；它只能让人认清自己。

pairs.key: Do not let what you do not have prevent you from using what you do have.
pairs.value: 不要因为你没有什么而阻止你利用你拥有什么。

pairs.key: The greatest risk is not taking one.
pairs.value: 最大的风险就是不冒风险。

pairs.key: Your fortune is as sweet as a cookie.
pairs.value: 你的运气像饼干一样甜。

pairs.key: Don't pursue happiness... create it.
pairs.value: 不要追求幸福，要创造幸福。

pairs.key: You have the deepest interest in all that is artistic.
pairs.value: 你对所有艺术的事物都有最深刻的兴趣。

pairs.key: Tomorrow at breakfast, listen carefully: do what rice krispies tell you to.
pairs.value: 听从你的直觉或者心愿，不要受别人的影响。

pairs.key: You will conquer obstacles to achieve success.
pairs.value: 你将克服困难，获得成功。

pairs.key: One that would have the fruit must climb the tree.
pairs.value: 想要果实就得爬树。

pairs.key: Some men dream of fortunes, others dream of cookies.
pairs.value: 有些人梦想财富，有些人梦想饼干。

pairs.key: A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.
pairs.value: 结论只是你厌倦思考的地方。

pairs.key: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together as they do in you.
pairs.value: 很少有像你一样美貌和美德兼备的人。

pairs.key: You will soon witness a miracle
pairs.value: 你很快就会见证一个奇迹。

pairs.key: Stay true to those who would do the same for you.
pairs.value: 对那些对你真心的人保持真诚。

pairs.key: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
pairs.value: 一个狂热者是一个不能改变自己的想法，也不愿意换个话题的人。

pairs.key: Extremely Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 极其稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: Don't worry about money. The best things in life are free.
pairs.value: 不要为钱担心。生活中最好的东西都是免费的。

pairs.key: The usefulness of a cup is in its emptiness.
pairs.value: 杯子的用处在于它的空虚。

pairs.key: Old friends make best friends
pairs.value: 老朋友是最好的朋友。

pairs.key: You will be hungry again in one hour.
pairs.value: 你一个小时后又会饿了。

pairs.key: Ones always regrets what could have done. Remember for next time.
pairs.value: 人总是后悔没有做过的事情。记住下次吧。

pairs.key: You are a hero to someone!
pairs.value: 你是某人的英雄！

pairs.key: If you have kleptomania. Take something for it.
pairs.value: 如果你有盗窃癖。'拿'点东西治治吧。

pairs.key: If you look back, you'll soon be going that way.
pairs.value: 如果你回头看，你很快就会走那条路。

pairs.key: Some days you are pigeon, some days you are statue. Today, bring umbrella.
pairs.value: 有些日子你是鸽子，有些日子你是雕像。今天带把伞吧。

pairs.key: Fortune not found? Abort, Retry, Ignore.
pairs.value: 运气找不到？中止、重试、忽略。

pairs.key: Everyday is a new day, but tomorrow is never promised.
pairs.value: 每天都是新的一天，但明天永远不会保证。

pairs.key: Of all our human resources, the most precious is the desire to improve.
pairs.value: 在我们所有的人力资源中，最珍贵的是进步的愿望。

pairs.key: Love is free. Lust will cost you everything you have.
pairs.value: 爱是免费的。欲望会让你付出你所拥有的一切。

pairs.key: I have a dream....Time to go to bed.
pairs.value: 我有一个梦想……该睡觉了。

pairs.key: You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.
pairs.value: 你不需要力量来放下某些东西。你真正需要的是理解。

pairs.key: The gods have smiled upon you!
pairs.value: 诸神对你微笑了！

pairs.key: Ninety-nine percent of all lawyers give the rest a bad name.
pairs.value: 百分之九十九的律师都给剩下的那一部分律师抹黑了。

pairs.key: The secret to staying young is good health and lying about your age.
pairs.value: 保持年轻的秘诀是健康和说谎关于你的年龄。

pairs.key: To determine whether someone is beautiful is not by looking at their appearance, but their heart.
pairs.value: 判断一个人是否美丽不是看他们的外表，而是看他们的心灵。

pairs.key: The cooler you think you are the dumber you look
pairs.value: 你越觉得自己很酷，你看起来越傻。

pairs.key: Land is always on the mind of a flying bird.
pairs.value: 飞鸟总想着陆地。

pairs.key: The greatest danger could be your stupidity.
pairs.value: 最大的危险可能是你的愚蠢。

pairs.key: Everyone agrees you are the best.
pairs.value: 每个人都认为你是最棒的。

pairs.key: A golden egg of opportunity falls into your lap this month.
pairs.value: 这个月，一个机会的金蛋会落到你的怀里。

pairs.key: Do not mistake temptation for opportunity.
pairs.value: 不要把诱惑当成机会。

pairs.key: You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime.
pairs.value: 你一生中会去很多异国他乡的地方。

pairs.key: The older you get, the better you were.
pairs.value: 你越老，你就越好。

pairs.key: Hardly anyone knows how much is gained by ignoring the future.
pairs.value: 几乎没有人知道忽视未来能够得到多少。

pairs.key: Be direct,usually one can accomplish more that way.
pairs.value: 直截了当吧，通常这样可以做得更多。

pairs.key: The problem with resisting temptation is that it may never come again.
pairs.value: 抵制诱惑的问题在于它可能再也不会出现了。

pairs.key: Your road to glory will be rocky but fulfilling.
pairs.value: 你通往荣耀的道路将会崎岖但充实。

pairs.key: He who throws dirt is losing ground. (DIRT)
pairs.value: 抛泥者自失地(DIRT)

pairs.key: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
pairs.value: 紧张是你认为你应该是什么样的人。放松是你真正是什么样的人。

pairs.key: Stop eating now. Food poisoning no fun.
pairs.value: 现在就停止吃东西。食物中毒不好玩。

pairs.key: You will live long enough to open many fortune cookies.
pairs.value: 你会活得足够长，能够打开很多幸运饼干。

pairs.key: Everything will now come your way.
pairs.value: 现在一切都会向着你的方向发展。

pairs.key: The important thing is to never stop questioning.
pairs.value: 重要的是永远不要停止质疑。

pairs.key: You will make many changes before settling down happily.
pairs.value: 你会做出很多改变，才能幸福地安定下来。

pairs.key: When in doubt, let your instincts guide you.
pairs.value: 当你有疑惑时，让你的本能指引你。

pairs.key: Time may fly by, but memories do not.
pairs.value: 时间可能飞逝，但回忆不会。

pairs.key: Success lies in the hands of those who wants it.
pairs.value: 成功掌握在那些想要它的人手中。

pairs.key: There are big changes ahead of you.  They will be good ones!
pairs.value: 你前方有很大的变化。它们会是好的！

pairs.key: The days that make us happy make us wise.
pairs.value: 让我们快乐的日子也让我们聪明。

pairs.key: You love peace.
pairs.value: 你爱和平。

pairs.key: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
pairs.value: 早起的鸟儿有虫吃，但第二只老鼠才能得到奶酪。

pairs.key: The simplest answer is to act.
pairs.value: 最简单的答案就是行动。

pairs.key: Your smile brings happiness to everyone you meet.
pairs.value: 你的微笑给你遇到的每个人带来幸福。

pairs.key: Life is too short to waste time hating anyone.
pairs.value: 生命太短暂了，不要浪费时间去恨任何人。

pairs.key: Gold is in your future.
pairs.value: 金子在你的未来。

pairs.key: It takes less time to do a thing right than it does to explain why you did it wrong.
pairs.value: 做对一件事所花费的时间比解释为什么做错了要少。

pairs.key: If a turtle doesn't have a shell, is it naked or homeless?
pairs.value: 如果一只乌龟没有壳了，它是裸体的还是无家可归的？

pairs.key: Wise person needs either good manners or fast reflexes.
pairs.value: 聪明的人需要有礼貌或者快速的反应。

pairs.key: You will be called to fill a position of high honor and responsibility.
pairs.value: 你将被召唤去担任一个高尚和重要的职位

pairs.key: Change is inevitable, except for vending machines.
pairs.value: 变化是不可避免的，除了自动售货机。

pairs.key: A cheerful message is on its way to you.
pairs.value: 一个快乐的消息正在向你赶来。

pairs.key: We cannot change the direction of the wind, but we can adjust our sails.
pairs.value: 我们不能改变风的方向，但我们可以调整我们的帆。

pairs.key: Tell them what you really think. Otherwise, nothing will change.
pairs.value: 告诉他们你真正想说的话。否则，什么都不会改变。

pairs.key: Adjust finances, make budgets, to improve you standing.
pairs.value: 调整财务，制定预算，以改善你的状况。

pairs.key: A kiss is not a kiss without the heart.
pairs.value: 没有心意的吻不算吻。

pairs.key: An admirer is concealing their affection for you.
pairs.value: 一个仰慕者正在对你隐藏他们的感情。

pairs.key: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
pairs.value: 如果你失败了，你可能会失望，但如果你不尝试，你就注定失败。

pairs.key: Fear is interest paid on a debt you may not owe.
pairs.value: 恐惧是你可能不欠的债务所付出的利息。

pairs.key: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
pairs.value: 一杯龙舌兰酒，两杯龙舌兰酒，三杯龙舌兰酒，倒在地板上。

pairs.key: We don't know the future, but here's a cookie.
pairs.value: 我们不知道未来，但这里有一块饼干。

pairs.key: You create enthusiasm around you.
pairs.value: 你在你周围创造热情。

pairs.key: He who dies with most toys, still dies.
pairs.value: 拥有最多玩具的人死了，还是死了。

pairs.key: Instead of worrying and agonizing, move ahead constructively.
pairs.value: 与其担心和痛苦，不如积极地向前进。

pairs.key: No distance is too far, if two hearts are tied together.
pairs.value: 如果两颗心紧紧相连，没有距离太远。

pairs.key: Everyone seems normal until you get to know them.
pairs.value: 每个人看起来都很正常，直到你了解他们。

pairs.key: Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.
pairs.value: 勇气不是没有恐惧；而是克服恐惧。

pairs.key: Rare Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 稀有的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: The world may be your oyster, but it doesn't mean you'll get its pearl.
pairs.value: 世界可能是你的牡蛎，但这并不意味着你会得到它的珍珠。

pairs.key: Person who eat fortune cookie get lousy dessert.
pairs.value: 吃幸运饼干的人得到糟糕的甜点。

pairs.key: The pleasure of what you enjoy is lost by wanting more.
pairs.value: 你享受的快乐会因为贪求更多而失去。

pairs.key: Difficulty at the beginning usually means ease at the end.
pairs.value: 开始时的困难通常意味着最后的轻松。

pairs.key: A stranger is a friend you have not spoken to yet.
pairs.value: 陌生人是你还没有说话的朋友。

pairs.key: Age is high price to pay for maturity.
pairs.value: 成熟是用年龄换来的高昂代价。

pairs.key: Person who rests on laurels gets thorn in backside.
pairs.value: 安于现状的人会被荆棘刺痛屁股。

pairs.key: You are broad minded and socially active.
pairs.value: 你思想开阔，社交活跃。.

pairs.key: Smart husband buys wife fine china. Then she not trust him to wash it.
pairs.value: 聪明的丈夫给妻子买精美的瓷器。然后她就不相信他能洗干净它。

pairs.key: Your many hidden talents will become obvious to those around you.
pairs.value: 你的许多隐藏的才能将会显露给你周围的人。

pairs.key: Inside every old person is young person wondering what the hell happened.
pairs.value: 每个老人的内心都有一个年轻人在想发生了什么。

pairs.key: The fortune you seek is in another cookie.
pairs.value: 你寻求的运气在另一块饼干里。

pairs.key: Legendary Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 传说级幸运饼干：

pairs.key: You are the controller of your destiny.
pairs.value: 你是你命运的掌控者。

pairs.key: Your golden opportunity is coming shortly.
pairs.value: 你的黄金机会即将到来。

pairs.key: For success today look first to yourself.
pairs.value: 今天要想成功，先看看自己。

pairs.key: It's about time I got out of that cookie.
pairs.value: 我早该从那块饼干里出来了。

pairs.key: You will soon have an out of money experience.
pairs.value: 你很快就会有一次没钱的经历。

pairs.key: Minor aches today are likely to pay off handsomely tomorrow.
pairs.value: 今天的小小疼痛可能明天就会得到丰厚的回报。

pairs.key: Atheism no fun. No holidays.
pairs.value: 无神论没意思。没有假期。

pairs.key: You are given the chance to take part in an exciting adventure.
pairs.value: 你有机会参与一场令人兴奋的冒险。

pairs.key: Procrastination is art of keeping up with yesterday.
pairs.value: 拖延是一种跟昨天保持一致的艺术。

pairs.key: Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.
pairs.value: 去做你害怕的事情，恐惧就会消失。

pairs.key: Your emotional nature is strong and sensitive
pairs.value: 你的情感本质是强烈和敏感的。

pairs.key: An alien of some sort will be appearing to you shortly.
pairs.value: 一个某种类型的外星人很快就会出现在你面前。

pairs.key: A foolish man listens to his heart. A wise man listens to cookies.
pairs.value: 愚蠢的人听从自己的心。聪明的人听从饼干。

pairs.key: When marriage outlawed, only outlaws have in-laws.
pairs.value: 当婚姻被禁止(outlawed)时，只有罪犯(outlaws)才有姻亲(in-laws)。

pairs.key: Do not be overly judgemental of your loved one's intentions or actions.
pairs.value: 不要过分地评判你所爱之人的意图或行为。

pairs.key: He who seeks will find.
pairs.value: 寻找的人会找到。

pairs.key: Okay to look at past and future. Just don't stare.
pairs.value: 看看过去和未来没关系。只要不要盯着看。

pairs.key: A merry heart does good like a medicine.
pairs.value: 快乐的心如同良药。

pairs.key: The real kindness comes from within you.
pairs.value: 真正的善良来自于你内心。

pairs.key: A fool and his money are soon partying.
pairs.value: 傻瓜和他的钱很快就会分道扬镳。

pairs.key: I am worth a fortune!
pairs.value: 我值一大笔钱！

pairs.key: Easiest way to find lost object is buy replacement.
pairs.value: 找到丢失的东西最简单的方法就是买一个替代品。

pairs.key: Politicians are like diapers: change often, and for same reason.
pairs.value: 政治家就像尿布：经常换，而且原因相同。

pairs.key: At this very moment you can change the rest of your life.
pairs.value: 在这一刻你可以改变你余生的命运。

pairs.key: A dream you have will come true
pairs.value: 你有一个梦想会成真。

pairs.key: Present your best ideas today to an eager and welcoming audience.
pairs.value: 今天向一个渴望并欢迎你的听众展示你最好的想法。

pairs.key: Common Fortune Cookie:
pairs.value: 常见的幸运饼干：

pairs.key: Flattery will go far tonight.
pairs.value: 今晚奉承会有很大的作用。

pairs.key: Help! I am being held prisoner in a fortune cookie factory.
pairs.value: 救命！我被困在了一个幸运饼干工厂里。

pairs.key: Be calm when confronting an emergency crisis.
pairs.value: 面对紧急危机时要保持冷静。

pairs.key: The best is yet to come.
pairs.value: 最好的还在后头。

pairs.key: You will think for yourself when you stop letting others think for you
pairs.value: 当你不再让别人替你思考时，你就会为自己思考。

pairs.key: Patience is your alley at the moment. Don't worry!
pairs.value: 现在耐心是你的好帮手。别担心！

pairs.key: The cake is a lie!
pairs.value: 蛋糕是个谎言！

pairs.key: It may be those who do most, dream most
pairs.value: 可能那些做得最多的人，也是梦想最多的人。

pairs.key: Your reality check is about to bounce.
pairs.value: 你的现实检验即将失败。

pairs.key: Nothing is so much to be feared as fear.
pairs.value: 没有什么比恐惧更可怕。

pairs.key: Now these three remain, faith, hope, and love. The greatest of these is love.
pairs.value: 现在这三样东西仍然存在，信仰、希望和爱。其中最伟大的就是爱。

pairs.key: Compassion is a way of being.
pairs.value: 同情是一种生活方式。

pairs.key: You are cleverly disguised as responsible adult.
pairs.value: 你是一个巧妙地伪装成负责任的成年人。

pairs.key: Do what is right, not what you should.
pairs.value: 做正确的事，而不是做你应该做的事。

pairs.key: What breaks in a moment may take years to mend.
pairs.value: 一时之间破碎的东西，可能需要花费多年才能修复。

pairs.key: Drive like hell, you will get there.
pairs.value: 开车像地狱一样，你就会到达那里。

pairs.key: What some call stubbornness, others call persistence.
pairs.value: 有些人称之为固执，有些人称之为坚持。

pairs.key: You will be sharing great news with all people you love
pairs.value: 你将会和你所爱的所有人分享好消息。

pairs.key: If you want the rainbow, then you have to tolerate the rain.
pairs.value: 如果你想要彩虹，那么你就必须忍受雨水。

pairs.key: Hard work pays off in the future. Laziness pays off now.
pairs.value: 努力工作会在未来有回报。懒惰现在就有回报。

pairs.key: Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.
pairs.value: 正直就是做正确的事，即使没有人在看

pairs.key: If you have something good in your life, don't let it go!
pairs.value: 如果你生活中有好的东西，不要放手！

pairs.key: Today you shed your last tear. Tomorrow fortune knocks at your door.
pairs.value: 今天你流下了最后一滴眼泪。明天幸运会敲响你的门。

pairs.key: You will die alone and poorly dressed.
pairs.value: 你会孤独地死去，而且穿着很糟糕

pairs.key: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.
pairs.value: 笑声是两个人之间最短的距离

pairs.key: Good health will be yours for a long time.
pairs.value: 你会拥有长久的健康

pairs.key: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
pairs.value: 勇气不仅仅是一种美德，而是在考验时所有美德的形式

pairs.key: There is no spoon!
pairs.value: 没有勺子!

pairs.key: You are worth loving, you are also worth the effort it takes to love you
pairs.value: 你值得被爱，你也值得付出努力去爱你

pairs.key: Never upset the driver of the car you're in. They're the master of your destiny until you get home.
pairs.value: 永远不要惹恼你所乘坐车辆的司机。他们在你回家之前都是你命运的主宰。

pairs.key: Fat person not afraid of heights... afraid of widths.
pairs.value: 胖子不怕高，只怕宽

pairs.key: Live like you are on the bottom, even if you are on the top.
pairs.value: 即使你在顶端，也要像在底层一样生活

pairs.key: Before trying to please others think of what makes you happy.
pairs.value: 在试图取悦别人之前，想想什么让你快乐

pairs.key: All things are difficult before they are easy.
pairs.value: 凡事都是先难后易

pairs.key: Experience is what you have left when everything else is gone.
pairs.value: 当其他一切都失去了，你还剩下的就是经验

pairs.key: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
pairs.value: 要避免批评，就什么都不做，什么都不说，什么都不成为

pairs.key: It is better to have a hen tomorrow than an egg today.
pairs.value: 明天有只母鸡比今天有个鸡蛋好

pairs.key: He who throws mud loses ground.
pairs.value: 抛泥者必失地

pairs.key: When chosen for jury duty, tell judge... fortune cookie say guilty!
pairs.value: 当被选为陪审团时，告诉法官……幸运饼干说有罪！

pairs.key: You will take a pleasant journey to a place far away.
pairs.value: 你将会去一个遥远的地方进行一次愉快的旅行

pairs.key: There is a prospect of a thrilling time ahead for you.
pairs.value: 你的前方有一段令人激动的时光

pairs.key: You think it's a secret, but they know.
pairs.value: 你以为这是个秘密，但他们知道

pairs.key: He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
pairs.value: 能够自嘲的人永远不缺笑料

pairs.key: Ask yourself if what you are doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.
pairs.value: 问问自己，你今天所做的事情是否让你更接近明天想要到达的地方

pairs.key: If you want the rainbow, you have to tolerate the rain.
pairs.value: 如果你想要彩虹，就必须忍受雨水

pairs.key: Sing and rejoice, fortune is smiling on you.
pairs.value: 唱歌并欢呼吧，幸运正在向你微笑

pairs.key: Life does not get better by chance. It gets better by change.
pairs.value: 生活不会因为偶然而变好。它会因为改变而变好

pairs.key: A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study.
pairs.value: 与智者一席之谈胜过十年苦读
